data.text:
Friday is here and so is our #airBalticQuiz! Last weekend we were excited to add another plane to our #A220 family. It made its way directly to us from Montreal, Canada. ✈️ 🇨🇦
Question - how many kilometres it approximately takes for the trip from Canada to Latvia? 📍

According to unaudited consolidated financial results for the first six months of 2021, @airBaltic group managed to reduce its net loss three times compared to 2020, amounting to EUR 61.5 million. Read more: https://t.co/NKbLnF7lxS https://t.co/4ZBxHp8TGW

#DidYouKnow that our Pilot Academy’s students are flying the Diamond 40 and Diamond 42 aircraft which are the greenest, most efficient, most modern aircraft of their type in the industry? https://t.co/rHkTPjN1t7

We believe that satisfied and happy customers are one of the key drivers of business success and growth. We have published new Customer Service Commitment - this is another step to improve @airBaltic customer service. Read more: https://t.co/5rNiPpDR0U https://t.co/Pl2tjVeTZn

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
Our Green Sale is here! Wrap up this summer with a vacation or plan your autumn getaway now cause flights to all airBaltic destinations are available at their lowest prices: https://t.co/PHFITPyvQY
Book 💻 24.08.2021.-07.09.2021.
Fly ✈️ 06.09.2021.-26.03.2022. https://t.co/duy0ROzBqE
In July 2021, we carried 209 146 passengers, or 38% more than during the same period last year. Last month we performed 2 559 flights in total: https://t.co/1KLfXU8LSs https://t.co/FFnhbL9B8N

It has been an honor to operate the Baltic country flag motive fleet for already two years 🇱🇻 🇱🇹 🇪🇪 It was first revealed in the 30th anniversary of the Baltic Way and it continues to carry the Baltic unity in the skies! https://t.co/0BHMBGFhue

data.text: For us A B C is not as easy as 1 2 3, because YL-ABC is already the fourth @Airbus A220-300 aircraft we’ve received this year! We can’t wait for three more to join our fleet in 2021 to continuously offer our passengers a brand new aircraft experience! ✈️ https://t.co/CGIkGBbrpV

Lai kompensētu Covid-19 pandēmijas radītos zaudējumus un veicinātu ekonomiskās krīzes pārvarēšanu, valdība kā lidsabiedrības vairākuma akcionārs atbalstījusi airBaltic pamatkapitāla palielināšanu par 90 miljoniem eiro: https://t.co/24DmgkiOA6 https://t.co/YcmecVNCIv

data.text: To compensate the losses caused by the ongoing Covid-19 pandemic and support overcoming of the economic crisis, the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Latvia has approved the investment of EUR 90 million into the equity of airBaltic: https://t.co/pLrpWNPXxr https://t.co/LX0k8IqCHi

Wow, the activity on this quiz makes us believe we have a lot of frequent flyers! The majority has a good eye - on our standard flights we do indeed have a crew of 5 people! 
Two pilots and three flight attendands to ensure you have a safe and pleasant flight! 🤗

data.text: Accepting a brand new aircraft is always a thrilling experience! On August 15, our crew delivered a new addition to our fleet directly from Canada to @riga_airport. Our 28th @Airbus A220-300 welcomes passengers with registration YL-ABB ✈️ https://t.co/3U3haQjukV

If you are interested in the dynamic aviation world, join our team as flight coordinator! In this role, you will be responsible for various ground handling activities to ensure safe, punctual, and consistent flight performance: https://t.co/CxwG95a3Zq https://t.co/uzAjNWhetX

data.text:
Welcome back to another #airBalticQuiz 💚 Have you ever been on our flights performed by @Airbus A220?
Do you know how many crew members (pilots and cabin crew) there are on board on a full standard flight? ✈️

data.text: We have become the first airline to fly the new RNP AR high-precision flight approaches at @riga_airport with our modern @Airbus A220-300 fleet. It enables more efficient arrival routes and contribute to saving fuel, further cutting CO2 and noise emissions https://t.co/Wg8EneBffP https://t.co/WxlVtX5oa1
#DidYouKnow that this year we were awarded the Silver Category in Sustainability Index by the Institute for Corporate Sustainability and Responsibility in Latvia? https://t.co/1j9JraSLI3

First multi engine flight is a serious milestone in every pilot’s career – it signifies hard work and training to master the profession. If you carry a dream of flying, apply for the next academy group now and start your studies already this September: https://t.co/ceRWPqc7th https://t.co/9GAFtm80d1

data.text: Thanks for participating! We have many people who enjoy (and know) random fun facts! Water salutes are ✨magical✨ because that’s how memorable things are celebrated - first landing at the new destination as well as captains’ retirement and other important milestones. 🎉

Let’s get quizical! 💪🏻🧠 This Friday for our #airBalticQuiz we want to find out if you enjoy random fun facts as much as we do! 
What’s the reason why water salutes are given to aircraft?

We are building a new passenger handling team to provide support for our passengers in @riga_airport. If you have excellent customer service skills, a positive attitude, and a detail-oriented personality, apply and start a rewarding professional pathway: https://t.co/ae5CiDa5jK https://t.co/Cq0qVkEC2s
#DidYouKnow that our technical department does most of its work at night and day shifts are more about being on call and available for unexpected situations? https://t.co/1oWly1uDHc

data.text: Congratulations to Latvian weightlifter Artūrs Plēsnieks who won a bronze Olympic medal! Latvia is very proud of your great achievement! Bringing home Olympic medalist was a very heartwarming experience for our team too! 🇱🇻 https://t.co/MGyODZFaUP

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: We continue ensuring the essential connectivity between Baltic capitals! This week we resumed direct flights between @TLLairport and @VilniusAirport. Currently two weekly flights are performed. See the flight schedule on https://t.co/iIdYuxTQZC https://t.co/t1LtLhRCs9

data.text: Upon passenger’s request, @airBaltic will extend the validity of gift vouchers issued as a refund for Covid-19 cancelled flights. They can be extended for travels till December 31, 2022. Please contact our Call Center for further assistance: https://t.co/kTjjrNEtoF https://t.co/vWm0AeWhmP

New Baltic Outlook available on board! This issue will take you to the Italian town of Pisa - an adventure for your senses with many architectural masterpieces and incredible food. Read the article, and see what else the new issue has for you 👉 https://t.co/Lcyem3ZPMR https://t.co/n7xnZrNkns

Constantly working to improve our passenger experience! We've introduced a new onboard platform SKY Service available during flight via mobile devices. data.text:
Thank you for participating! As you may know, we like to be innovative and take the lead. But what will surprise you is that only 39% got it right this time 👀 
Back in 2007 airBaltic was proud to launch its online check-in system! Time flies (even though it’s not an A220)! ✈️

Time for #airBalticQuiz! As we are moving forward and adding new features to our website such as co-browsing, let’s take a walk down the memory lane…. 
When was one of the first major online features - airBaltic online check-in introduced? 🖥

data.text: We are happy to improve our passenger travel experience, introducing an online self-service platform for delayed baggage service. data.text: A significant era has come to an end - airBaltic Training has said goodbye to the Boeing 737 full flight simulator. Farewell - thank you for your service since 2010! https://t.co/qpzQKfYv0k

Thank you for participating!
Most of you got it right as one of the most challenging clouds is Cumulonimbus ☁️ 
It’s heavy and dense cloud with rain, hail and lightning inside. It is recommended to avoid them as much as possible. https://t.co/JAmSYXJP5b

data.text:
Another Friday, another #airBalticQuiz! This week we’re focusing on an important aspect of aviation - meteorology 🌤 
Which of the following type of clouds requires pilots to avoid flying through them? ☁️

#DidYouKnow that our company has a devoted Quality Department, which is responsible for monitoring the regulated aviation activities and performing activity-specific audits across our organization, fleet and network? https://t.co/gs2WIpApOg

data.text:
Busy days at airport are our favourite! ✈️
This year’s travel season is at its peak - we’re excited to conquer the sky and race the clouds together with you! Watch a recent time-lapse of our fleet getting ready for flights at @riga_airport! https://t.co/U7opkHzlCv

Congratulations to airBaltic Training for welcoming already its 9th @DiamondAircraft training aircraft for airBaltic Pilot Academy! We are proud of your on-going commitment to invest in the best training aircraft in the industry. https://t.co/rnRO8ok1qS https://t.co/WyaEanVXHQ
We are very lucky to experience some amazing sunsets this summer! 🧡 https://t.co/kQspaVlz6B

Quiz time is up and the majority of you have answered correctly!

Liepāja is known as the city of wind! Indeed - it is the windiest city in Latvia and the region holds the largest wind farm in the country! 🌬

data.text: Jumping into Friday with another #airBalticQuiz! We have just issued our fourth #NFT this week on OpenSea. This new #cryptoart represents one of the most beloved Latvian cities on the Baltic Sea coast - Liepāja 🌊 Which of these is also another name that this city goes by?
In June 2021, airBaltic has carried 114 700 passengers or 70% more than the previous month. Read more about June passenger statistics here: https://t.co/367Bm9UqQ5 https://t.co/vzr6JaGmoD
#DidYouKnow that "Where are you going today?" is one of the most asked questions in the crew center? https://t.co/TXyVwKmD7W

data.text: airBaltic's new #NFT collection is live! Edition 4 NFTs are showcasing Liepāja #cryptoart and have been issued on @opensea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.01 Ether. A total of 10 new unique collectibles can be purchased now: https://t.co/EwU1Hu6psL https://t.co/dKZ83L3gwD

Our biggest flight sale is here! 🔔 Flights to all airBaltic destinations are available at their lowest prices. Book your last-minute summer holidays or start planning your autumn break now: https://t.co/BKFbObeX4b https://t.co/JA6TcOkQYJ

data.text: Summer travel has resumed and we are ready to carry you!✈️Last week we launched our first flights to 7 new destinations: Valencia, Pisa, Edinburgh, Kos, Bergen, Trondheim, and Manchester. Check out our new destinations and choose yours: https://t.co/JYFqOOL7zM https://t.co/74wiu1Dgj4

Thanks for participating. Naples is the city of seven castles! 60% of you tapped the right answer and we bet that 100% of you would be amazed by the historical charm of this destination! If you fancy a flight there: https://t.co/fBLvtS2tB2 https://t.co/SwNTiRUcaY
When returning to our home base in Riga, we are always delighted to see the evergreen forests and meadows below. Have a great and sun-filled weekend! https://t.co/X1XEskln2E

Naples is a true gem for history lovers and also one of our newest destinations! ✈️ Filled with sunshine and historical sites, this city can truly create a perfect ambiance for your holidays. ☀️ Do you know how many castles are there in Naples? #airBalticQuiz

#DidYouKnow that the two routes in our network, which cross the most country air spaces on standard circumstances, are Lisbon and Palma de Mallorca? It takes 10 country air spaces to reach these destinations from Riga. https://t.co/DIHP49FzAr

data.text: Give a round of applause for our new flying queen! Our 27th @Airbus A220-300 has just joined the airBaltic fleet at the @riga_airport. ABA – we can’t wait to hear your music in the skies! https://t.co/GQ4fwvlBTq
This was a week full of midsummer festivities here in Latvia! 🌿 In this #airBalticQuiz we would like to know - which one of the mentioned traditions and activities are your favourite?

data.text:
To make the check-in and boarding process as smooth as possible, we offer to check your Covid-19 related travel documents already before your travel! 
👉 Send them to c19doc@airbaltic.com up to 24h before departure.
🔔 We will notify you once your documents are approved. https://t.co/5FWYekBnjH

It's the time of year when nature is at its fullest, when the meadows are in full bloom, and flora is said to possess magical powers. Let your soul become enchanted by midsummer magic! 🌿 https://t.co/3dVGmZ0cGb

Italy is often named as world's most desirable holiday destination. Recently we launched new flights to Italy's most soulful city Naples. Watch our first landing there and uncover what there is to explore in this beautiful Italian capital of south: https://t.co/ua00HYJTWp https://t.co/UoazUmOoI4

#DidYouKnow that the most popular destination for our passengers this Midsummer Solstice Holiday week is... drumroll 🥁... Milan?
Barcelona, Heraklion, Nice and Malaga are also among the most loved and demanded! https://t.co/vqqi6ZOhTk

Thanks for voting! We’re excited to announce that 41% of you voted for the Latvian livery! 🇱🇻 
However, we are proud of all of our beauties. 😍 https://t.co/yCD3Q3VQ12

Beautiful day here in Riga and it’s time for #airBalticQuiz! ☀️ How about some healthy competition between our three special livery aircraft? Which one has stolen your heart and is your personal favourite? ✈️

data.text: The usually high travel season is finally here! ✈️ We understand its slightly different this year, therefore we have gathered all the key elements for your safe and comfortable travels. Remember that all the details can also be found here: https://t.co/lOB7mx3wiZ https://t.co/RO8ewdEtAu

Vasara un ceļošanas laiks ir klāt! ✈️ 
Nelielā video esam apkopojuši visu svarīgāko, kas pasažieriem jāievēro, lai ceļojums būtu ērts un komfortabls. Tāpat aktuālo informāciju vienmēr iegūsiet šeit: https://t.co/hHLWc1sXij https://t.co/ZqlRD0Q1fg

data.text: #DidYouKnow that Latvian basketball player Kristaps Porzingis is 2m 21cm tall? We were glad to welcome him on board this week! Welcome back home, @kporzee! https://t.co/HSo9wGkq0v
RT @Sat_Min: ✈️No 16. jūnija tiek atcelts nebūtisku ceļojumu aizliegums, prasība veikt #COVID19 testu un doties pašizolācijā, ieceļojot Lat…

Corfu is the perfect summer getaway destination. It has the best of both worlds – busy cities with everything needed for tourists, and romantic seaside villages with beautiful beaches just a short drive away. Learn more about this island ✈️ https://t.co/zhDw59k3Cq https://t.co/n0gNUxivME

data.text:
Thanks for participating! 😉 This time third of you got it right! The event was founded in 1913 to mark 100 years since the birth of Giuseppe Verdi. 🎵
Direct flights to Verona as of December 18th, 2021! Book here: https://t.co/sbAoIIHcvm
Don’t stop traveling until you’ve seen the sunset from every coast 🌤 https://t.co/DTXYBpqwMS

Have you ever been in Verona? Maybe you have been lucky enough to attend one of the city’s most famous event – The Arena Opera Festival? 🎶 In this #airBalticQuiz we would like to test your history knowledge. Do you know the year when this event was founded? 😊

During May 2021, we have carried 67 300 passengers or 37% more than the previous month. We are happy to see an increased interest from passengers for flights to destinations in Mediterranean as the epidemiological situation improves. Read more: https://t.co/5LvdDIL0Wb https://t.co/vIHFjmWlG2

data.text: Watch our @Airbus A220 landing from the first Riga – Santorini flight, and enjoy the iconic panorama view of the island's crystal blue waters and charming white houses. Add Santorini to your travel bucket list as Greece is open to travelers this summer: https://t.co/sLZEYVhgqK https://t.co/rvBlROCTVc

A timely restart for air travel and tourism means finally being able to reconnect with our families, embrace different cultures and reunite with friends. We support @A4Europe initiative #DestinationEurope calling for the safe reopening of EU borders: https://t.co/HrxlfWsC5I https://t.co/c9iuYHsi1D

data.text: Ease your travelling with flight and hotel included! We have launched a new product airBaltic Holidays, offering customers dynamic travel packages, which include both a flight and a hotel reservation. Choose your perfect match: https://t.co/vL4yHOaufp https://t.co/7s0KAjOQWI

urls.title: airBaltic City Collection - Collection
urls.description: airBaltic – the flag carrier of Latvia, in honour of Latvia’s centenary, in 2018, invited everyone to vote on their favourite towns and cities in Latvia, after which the company’s Airbus A220-300 fleet was named. Starting with Kuldiga, these cities will now one by one be represented on the digital art pieces issued by airBaltic. airBaltic’s jet fleet is the youngest in the Europe, consisting solely of the brand new Airbus A220-300.

data.text: The latest Baltic Outlook issue spotlights the famous Greek island Santorini. Spectacular landscapes, blue domes, whitewashed buildings contrasting the black volcanic cliffs, and the famous tangerine sunsets are a must-see! Read the full article: https://t.co/8VKxlQv52O https://t.co/5ipsJB48Ux

data.text: We’re hiring a Digital Marketing Manager! If you have experience in managing digital cross-channel marketing campaigns and have strong analytical skills - join us now and take your career to new heights: https://t.co/9T2KJdXfvm https://t.co/KEVOdjwrIp

#DidYouKnow that pilots don’t hear applauses during landing roll since they are busy with procedures during rollout, communication with air traffic controller and receiving taxi instructions? 👨‍✈️ https://t.co/jN9BZUaIgc

Today we are celebrating all cabin crew, who dedicate their lives to the skies! Your superpower to turn travel into a safe and joyful experience is one of the things that makes aviation magical! Happy International Flight Attendant's Day from airBaltic family!💚 https://t.co/3MIAEzQvrV

Thanks for participating! 🤗 This year we will offer 8 destinations in the sunny Italy, including 7 already this summer! 😎 Go check them out on our web page https://t.co/08f7aKHyl4 
Which is the dream one for you?

For our latest article, we talked with our technician Yurii Miklush to find out about the duties and job specifics of an avionics technician here at @airBaltic, why he moved to Latvia all the way from Ukraine, and why he is so proud of this profession: https://t.co/HMrUNloURM https://t.co/wNeME9Np9B
👋The rain has passed, the sun is out and we are ready for the weekend! Are you? https://t.co/owNR805Ugb
#airBalticQuiz is knocking on your door so is the active summer! ☀️ This time we are wondering do you know how many destinations we will have in Italy this year? 🇮🇹

There is no place for inequality! We stand for a united and accepting attitude everywhere. Only by embracing diversity, we grow as a company and as a society. Take a look at our sustainability page to find out how #diverse we are: https://t.co/wkC3YtjPhE #EuropeanDiversityMonth https://t.co/NO2J90BK3h

#DidYouKnow that this week we recognized the Aviation Maintenance Technician Day? Those are professionals who keep aviation safe and possible every day. They inspect, maintain and repair the aircraft, so it can function smoothly and be safe for passengers and crew. https://t.co/r9XQdmEkTR
